transcript:
did you know that validation is one of
the most important skills that we were
never taught
what is validation it is the act of
helping someone feel heard and
understood
so validating and reassurance is
basically the same thing it's when
you're allowing someone to speak safely
and of voicing their thoughts and their
emotions
in other words it really means that you
are allowing them to share their
feelings and you are accepting them for
who they are next time you practice
validation recognize someone's thoughts
and feelings be a listener and this will
help you build and strengthen any
relationships out there
